first_para: Heather Kay Wheeler (born 14 May 1959) is a British Conservative Party politician, who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for South Derbyshire, taking the seat from the Labour Party after 13 years.

full.extract:
Heather Kay Wheeler (born 14 May 1959) is a British Conservative Party politician, who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for South Derbyshire, taking the seat from the Labour Party after 13 years.
^ "Heather Wheeler MP". BBC Democracy Live. BBC. Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ http://www.ukwhoswho.com/view/article/oupww/whoswho/U251302/
^ http://www.london-gazette.co.uk/issues/59418/notices/1118281/from=2010-05-06;to=2010-05-19;all=returned+westminster/
^ "Election 2010: South Derbyshire". thisisderbyshire.co.uk. Retrieved 7 May 2010.
full.title: Heather Wheeler
